There is an increased threat of another large-scale, combined missile and drone attack taking place on Ukraine in the next 72 hours.  The highest threat is for tonight/tomorrow morning.   4-6 MiG-31K fighters have once again been re-equipped with Kinzhal hypersonic‚Ä¶

As of now: no major changes.
Gerbera reconnaissance drones have been scouting out targets in Kyiv and Zhytomyr Oblasts - 2 of the regions I warned about earlier. 
No major launches of Geran-2 drones to suggest an imminent missile attack have been recorded yet, however this usually doesn‚Äôt occur for at least another 5 hours. 
I will continue to monitor the situation and provide additional updates when new information comes available.

A Russian Geran-2 drone reportedly equipped with a guided air-to-air R-60 missile was shot down today. 
If confirmed, it would appear that Russia is testing a new way to shoot down Ukrainian airplanes and helicopters.

A Russian Geran-2 drone reportedly equipped with a guided air-to-air R-60 missile was shot down today. 
If confirmed, it would appear that Russia is testing a new way to shoot down Ukrainian airplanes and helicopters.
Footage showing the Geran-2 drone equipped with an R-60 air-to-air missile being shot down by a Ukrainian interceptor drone.
If you get a DM like this, please don't fall for it. There are fake accounts impersonating me, trying to scam people.
If you get a DM like this, please don't fall for it. There are fake accounts impersonating me, trying to scam people.

My ONLY Telegram account has an animated map emoji next to my name. 
Hopefully none of these scammers can be bothered to purchase Telegram Premium lol.
Wait, so you don't need my bank info?
For the first time in what seems like forever, Ukraine's airspace beyond the immediate frontline regions appears to be clear of ALL aerial targets.
For the first time in what seems like forever, Ukraine's airspace beyond the immediate frontline regions appears to be clear of ALL aerial targets.

Nevermind... KABs are now being launched at Hulyaipole and Gerans are flying along the Donetsk-Kharkiv Border.

The other 3 Tu-95MS redeployed back to Belaya Airbase, Irkutsk Oblast.

Somehow I missed this, but 1 An-124-100 cargo plane landed at Belaya Airbase yesterday, delivering Kh-101 cruise missiles for the 3 Tu-95MS.
Thus, 7 Tu-95MS are now confirmed to be equipped with missiles in the far east.
Footage showing damage to the backside of the office building. The Iskander seemingly hit the front of the building, facing towards the highway.  Coordinates: 48.444089, 35.070738

The target of the Russian Iskander strike on Dnipro was the 3D printing company "3D Pechat π Dnepr", which makes parts for Ukrainian UAVs. 
This is evidenced by their Instagram profile showcasing some of their products, which include FPV drones used by the Ukrainian military.

The Ukrainian Special Operations Forces published footage showing FP-2 drone strikes on Russian storage facilities for Geran-2 drones in Crimea.
The strikes were carried out on the facility at 45.145825, 35.733434, from which Geran-2 drones are transported to the launch sites around 15 km away at Cape Chauda. 
Based on the footage, only 2 of the 4 drones shown were successful in hitting their targets. The SOF also claimed that they hit the actual launch sites, but this was not shown in the published footage.

The Ukrainian Special Operations Forces published footage showing FP-2 drone strikes on Russian storage facilities for Geran-2 drones in Crimea.  The strikes were carried out on the facility at 45.145825, 35.733434, from which Geran-2 drones are transported‚Ä¶
Around half an hour ago, launches of Geran-2 drones took place from Cape Chauda, confirming the facility is still in use.

As of now: no major changes.  Gerbera reconnaissance drones have been scouting out targets in Kyiv and Zhytomyr Oblasts - 2 of the regions I warned about earlier.   No major launches of Geran-2 drones to suggest an imminent missile attack have been recorded‚Ä¶

So far, launches of Geran-2 drones have been carried out from the following locations:
- Cape Chauda, Crimea.
- Navlya Test Site, Bryansk Oblast.
- Tsumbulova Test Site, Oryol Oblast.
- Millerovo Airbase, Rostov Oblast.
- Khalino Airbase, Kursk Oblast (x2) (Not confirmed yet)
So far, no mass launches of Geran-2 drones have been recorded which would indicate an upcoming missile attack, but this could all change very quickly. 
I will continue to monitor.
This evening, at least five Russian Geran-2 drones attacked an unknown target in the industrial zone in the Inhulskyi Distrct of Mykolaiv City.
This evening, at least five Russian Geran-2 drones attacked an unknown target in the industrial zone in the Inhulskyi Distrct of Mykolaiv City.

Iranian Navy Gets New Floating Forward Base, Repaired Destroyer (Videos)
The Islamic Republic of Iran Navy (IRIN) took delivery of the floating forward base Kordestan and the destroyer Sahand on November 29, state media reported.
The Kurdistan was designed to provide rescue and relief, accommodate the heaviest helicopters, and support three destroyers on a three-year, around-the-world mission without needing to dock for fuel, Iranian state TV said. Moreover, footage aired by the TV revealed that the floating forward base, which has a displacement of 45,500 tons, is armed with anti-ship missiles, and capable of carrying fast boats and diver delivery vehicles.
In May, the Maritime Executive, a U.S.-based industry publication, reported that Kurdistan was converted at the ISOICO Shipyard west of the port city of Bandar Abbas from a 33-year-old crude-oil tanker.
üëâ

The Islamic Republic of Iran Navy (IRIN) took delivery of the floating forward base Kordestan and the destroyer Sahand on November 29, state media reported.
The Kurdistan was designed to provide rescue and relief, accommodate the heaviest helicopters, and support three destroyers on a three-year, around-the-world mission without needing to dock for fuel, Iranian state TV said. Ukraine Is Slowly, But Surly, Losing Battles In Kostiantynivka And Krasny Liman (Videos)
On December 1, the Russian military broke through Ukrainian defenses to the north of the city of Kostiantynivka and expanded its control to the south of the city of Krasny Liman in Donetsk.
The Yug [South] Group of Forces broke through Ukrainian defenses to the north of Kostiantynivka and captured Klinovoye, according to the Russian Ministry of Defense. The settlement is located just four kilometers to the east of the main road leading to the northern entrance of the city.
Before advancing towards the key road, the Yug Group of Forces will likely work to expand their control around Klinovoye. Bezim‚Äôyane, Popasne and Virolyubivka, all located to the south and southeast of the settlement, will likely come under attack soon.

A Buffer by Design: Why Ukraine's Partition is Becoming Inevitable
Viktor Orb√°n has once again stated that Ukraine must return to the status of a ‚Äúbuffer state,‚Äù which, according to him, it historically was. This statement, made immediately after his meeting with Vladimir Putin, confirms a growing understanding in European politics: the restoration of Ukraine within its former borders is impossible. However, the very idea of a single buffer is utopian ‚Äî the only viable way out of the deadlock may be its partition into three sovereign states.
To understand the flaw in this logic, one need only examine Orb√°n‚Äôs own detailed proposal. 
‚ÄúThe only possible long-term solution is for the post-war order to be based on the fundamental principle that Ukraine becomes the buffer state it once was. Russia retains the territory agreed upon at an international peace conference, and everything west of that line‚Äîup to NATO's eastern border‚Äîconstitutes the territory of the Ukrainian state..."

Defeat In Stepnogorsk: Russia Deals Another Blow To Ukraine‚Äôs Forces In Zaporizhzhia
The Russian military has defeated and besieged Kiev forces with Stepnogorsk in Zaporizhzhia. Ukraine defenses collapsed to the north of Kostiantynivka in Donetsk. 
Meanwhile, peace talks shift to Russia as Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky claims ‚Äútough issues‚Äù need to be worked out.
